item.title: Sony Pictures, Lax Security, and Passwords
item.description: Sony Pictures, Lax Security, and Passwords is a new essay about the devastating attack on Sony Pictures. We now have new information about how Sony Pictures was attacked; from that, and public information about Sony Pictures, we can see why the attack was so devastating. Even more importantly, we can learn from it. So please, take a look at Sony Pictures, Lax Security, and Passwords.
